name: Aggressive Charge
text: Assist. Berserker.

name: Balanced Defense
text: Reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play by 1.

name: Battle Cry
text: Berserker. Resilience.

name: Blade Reflex
text: While your mastery is focused, ignore the stamina cost of this card. At the end of your action phase, return a card with slash from your sequence to your hand.

name: Blade Surge
text: You may play a Defense Card from your discard pile as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Blind Rage
text: Assist. Increase your sequence limit by 1 this turn.

name: Counterstrike
text: Black Diamond + Red Diamond: Increase the damage the attack deals by 3.

name: Defensive Insight
text: Reveal any number of Defense Card from your hand and then draw that many cards.

name: Deflecting Blade
text: Search your deck for a card with slash and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Double Slash
text: If the next card you play in your sequence is a Red Diamond, reduce its stamina cost by 1.

name: Dragon Dash
text: Scissors: Reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play by 1.

name: Dragon Descent
text: Red Diamond + Black Diamond: Increase the damage this attack deals by 2 for each other card with slash in your sequence.

name: Dragon Strike
text: Assist. Defense Card + Black Diamond: Draw 1.

name: Empty Fade
text: You may play a card with slash as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Endurance
text: Draw 1. Scissors: Draw 2 instead.

name: Engage
text: Choose another player in your sector or an adjacent sector to draw 1.

name: Evasive Step
text: Search your deck for a Red Diamond and add it to your hand. Then reshuffle your deck.

name: Exhausting Defense
text: Remove 1 struggle for each Defense Card in your hand and reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play by 1.

name: Feral Desire
text: Search your discard pile for a card with slash and add it to your hand.

name: Final Breath
text: If your health is critical, draw up to your hand size limit +1.

name: Guardian Blade
text: At the end of your action phase, choose another player to draw 1 for each Red Diamond in your sequence (max: draw 3).

name: Guardian
text: At the end of your action phase, return a card from your sequence to your hand.

name: Heavy Clash
text: Assist. Remove 1 struggle token.

name: Hurricane
text: Reduce the stamina cost of cards with slash by 1 until the end of the turn.

name: Jumping Slice
text: Assist. If you paid with a Blue Diamond, increase the damage this attack deals by 3.

name: Lacerate
text: Yellow Diamond + Black Diamond: This attack inflicts vulnerable.

name: Lateral Jump
text: When you play a Blue Diamond in your sequence, you may discard this card from your hand to immediately move without paying any stamina cost.

name: Lateral Move
text: Assist. While this is the top card of your discard pile, reduce the stamina cost of your movements to 0.

name: Massive Strike
text: Finisher. You can only play this card after a Red Diamond. Increase the damage this attack deals by 5.

name: Momentum Strike
text: Increase the damage this attack deals by 1 for each Blue Diamond in your discard pile.

name: Precise Strike
text: This attack inflicts vulnerable.

name: Pressing Strike
text: Draw 2.

name: Primal Fury
text: Berserker. Draw 1 or heal 1.

name: Quick Attack
text: When you discard this card from your hand, deal your base weapon damage.

name: Rapid Slash
text: Assist.

name: Reactive Guard
text: Resilience. Black Diamond + Red Diamond: Draw 1.

name: Retreat
text: Draw 2.

name: Sentinel
text: Resilience. When you or another player in your sector would suffer damage, you may discard this card from your hand. If you do, prevent that damage.

name: Slash to the Flank
text: If you are in a flank sector, you may play a Red Diamond as the next card in your sequence without paying its stamina cost.

name: Swift Dodge
text: Reduce the stamina cost of the next card you play by 1.

name: Tactical Guard
text: Increase the struggle this maneuver removes by 1. While a Yellow Diamond is on top of your discard pile, it counts for the attrition check this turn.

name: Thwart
text: When another player removes struggle, you may discard this card from your hand to double the amount of struggle removed. Then the active player draws 1 card.

name: Voice of the Dragon
text: Assist. Resilience. Reduce the stamina cost of each Red Diamond you play this turn by 1.

name: Wrath of Blood
text: If your health is critical, increase the damage this attack deals by 5.
